steps: Heat the oil in a large pan over medium head. Add the red onion, chorizo and garlic then cook, stirring occasionally, for 6-8 minutes until golden.

Add the tomatoes and a pinch of salt and pepper to the pan. Mix well. Reduce the head a bit and cover the pan. It should be bubbling gently. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 15-20 minutes or until the tomatoes have popped and started to break down.
Remove the lid and turn the heat back up and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and reserve some of the pasta water
Stir in the soft cheese and then add the pasta water (50ml) and mix well and serve.
